definition: variant of 銹|锈, to corrode/to rust

sentences.english: This is the cultural equivalent of rust.
sentences.chinese: 這就是在文化上等價於鐵鏽的東西。

sentences.english: Coca Cola is an excellent rust buster.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂是鐵鏽的“天敵”。
對小麥造成侵襲的一種鐵鏽菌。

sentences.english: Water lines using lead lined or bare steel pipes that are already clogged with rust by the time they are first put to use.
sentences.chinese: 水道管是鉛襯管或裸鋼管，首次使用時便被鐵鏽堵塞。

sentences.english: Air compressor of eduction rust water flow to the brick surface don't.
sentences.chinese: 空壓機排出的鐵鏽水不要流到磚面上。

sentences.english: Thematic wall with bluestone ferruginous board show irregular put.
sentences.chinese: 主題牆以青石鐵鏽板呈不規則擺放。

sentences.english: There is dent and rust of the metal shelf(hob), which need to be re-produced.
sentences.chinese: 這些鐵架有凹痕，有鐵鏽，需要返工處理。

sentences.english: The tools will corrode with rust if never used.
sentences.chinese: 這些工具如長期不用會長鐵鏽而損壞。

sentences.english: The winter blend is a rust color and 100% acrylic.
sentences.chinese: 冬季混織襯裏爲鐵鏽色，由100%丙烯酸織物製成。

sentences.english: Sterile ovary globose, densely ferruginous villous.
sentences.chinese: 不育的子房球狀，密被具鐵鏽色長柔毛。

sentences.english: Tarnished blades are cleaned easily with steel wool and scouring powder.
sentences.chinese: 用鋼絲球和去污粉可以很容易地清洗掉刀刃上的鐵鏽。

sentences.english: Young branches with dense ferruginous scales.
sentences.chinese: 幼枝具緊密的鐵鏽色的鱗片。

sentences.english: This iron pipe is scaly with rust.
sentences.chinese: 這鐵管上有鱗狀般的鐵鏽。

definition: the spongy, white pulp inside the stem of rush plants, used as a wick for oil lamps
(of sb or sth) whole or entire body
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
